html: Andy Brodock’s wife was diagnosed w/ stage 4 cancer at age 28. When she lost her job due to illness, she lost her health insurance. Say it with me: Your health insurance should not be tied to your job! #MedicareForAll would fix that and so much more.https://www.msnbc.com/hallie-jackson/watch/husband-makes-plea-for-medicare-for-all-in-memory-of-late-wife-1514922051898 …

html: Our profit-driven health care system hurts patients. -1 in 4 Americans skip treatment due to cost -Half fear bankruptcy from medical emergency -2 million workers change insurance every month But at least the top health care CEOs made $1.1 billion last year. #MedicareForAll
text:
Our profit-driven health care system hurts patients.

-1 in 4 Americans skip treatment due to cost
-Half fear bankruptcy from medical emergency
-2 million workers change insurance every month

But at least the top health care CEOs made $1.1 billion last year. #MedicareForAll

html: Thank you to Congresswoman @PramilaJayapal for joining us in celebration of three powerful, bold, and courageous Democratic women — Reps. Kiah Morris & Joan Lenes, and Jane Curtis — at this year’s Curtis-Hoff Leadership Awards! “It’s our turn.” — @KiahMorrisVT #vtpolipic.twitter.com/urFag0ZqpU

html: "Our health care system today costs 18% of our GDP. text:
"Our health care system today costs 18% of our GDP. In 10 years, we're going to be spending $50 trillion on our current health care system."

html: Why is it that other major countries can guarantee universal health care for half — literally half — the cost of what the United States spends, and yet we can’t do it? It comes down to profit-making motives that are baked into a system. — @RepJayapalpic.twitter.com/Gzf4BjA6Cm
text:
Why is it that other major countries can guarantee universal health care for half — literally half — the cost of what the United States spends, and yet we can’t do it?

It comes down to profit-making motives that are baked into a system.

— @RepJayapalpic.twitter.com/Gzf4BjA6Cm

html: Health care is a right for all, it should not be a privilege for the few. The #MedicareForAll bill that we will introduce tomorrow will cover more people and more services on faster timeline than ever proposed before. It's time to put people first!https://news.vice.com/en_us/article/43z7qg/democrats-are-about-to-drop-their-most-aggressive-medicare-for-all-bill-yet-heres-whats-in-it …
text:

html: The president's speech this evening was a big nothingburger. Nothing new. A border wall fantasy premised on the same old lies and xenophobia is not going happen. Time for the GOP to move on and help end the government shutdown so we can all start focusing on what matters.
text:
The president's speech this evening was a big nothingburger. 

Nothing new. A border wall fantasy premised on the same old lies and xenophobia is not going happen. Time for the GOP to move on and help end the government shutdown so we can all start focusing on what matters.

html: In this election, we saw voters who make between $50-100K sifting left. Min. wage increases passed in Missouri and Arkansas. Medicaid expansion passed in Republican states. The GOP agenda isn't resonating and they're delivering gains for the wealthy, not working people.
text:
In this election, we saw voters who make between $50-100K sifting left. 

Min. wage increases passed in Missouri and Arkansas.

Medicaid expansion passed in Republican states.

The GOP agenda isn't resonating and they're delivering gains for the wealthy, not working people.

html: Although we (narrowly) lost a few elections that we really wanted to win, we were told that we should never even hope to make it a close race! I'll tell you one thing: we'll continue to fight for our values in every state, in every county, because working families deserve better.
text: Although we (narrowly) lost a few elections that we really wanted to win, we were told that we should never even hope to make it a close race! I'll tell you one thing: we'll continue to fight for our values in every state, in every county, because working families deserve better.

html: For the first time ever, at least 100 women will serve in the U.S. Congress, including so many women of color! We won key governorships to help us tackle gerrymandering and other important state issues. And oh by the way, I still serve on the House Judiciary Committee!
text: For the first time ever, at least 100 women will serve in the U.S. Congress, including so many women of color! We won key governorships to help us tackle gerrymandering and other important state issues. And oh by the way, I still serve on the House Judiciary Committee!

html: Last night, we accomplished a resounding victory: The American people voted to put Democrats back in control of the U.S. House, to control the legislative agenda and to fight against this administration's destructive policies, corruption, and injustice.
text: Last night, we accomplished a resounding victory: The American people voted to put Democrats back in control of the U.S. House, to control the legislative agenda and to fight against this administration's destructive policies, corruption, and injustice.

html: Together, we built an amazing grassroots movement that knocked on 34,500 doors, made more than 100,000 phone calls, and organized over 1,050 volunteers to elect progressive candidates in Washington state and across the nation.
text: Together, we built an amazing grassroots movement that knocked on 34,500 doors, made more than 100,000 phone calls, and organized over 1,050 volunteers to elect progressive candidates in Washington state and across the nation.

html: Today, Washington became the 21st state to abolish life without parole for youth offenders, based on the state's constitutional ban on cruel punishment.
